title: Friends list on ALPHA CLIENT
body: I am just wondering, Is there a possibility of the Alpha Client to have the option of showing your friends list while in a champion select mode or option? I am just wondering this because maybe you're in a ranked match and someone on your team has skype or discord or even teamspeak and you wanted to add them. And you cant? This is really curious from me. Just wondering! Thanks! :D

replies.body:
I'm not on the team that works with and develops the new client, so I can't really speculate on this. I'd recommend reaching out on the [Alpha Client Discussion Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) for more information. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
